15#ifndef DNS_RBTDB_H
16#define DNS_RBTDB_H 1
17
18#include <isc/lang.h>
19#include <dns/types.h>
20
21/*****
22 ***** Module Info
23 *****/
24
25/*! \file
26 * \brief
27 * DNS Red-Black Tree DB Implementation
28 */
29
30ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
31
32isc_result_t
33dns_rbtdb_create(isc_mem_t *mctx, const dns_name_t *base, dns_dbtype_t type,
34 dns_rdataclass_t rdclass, unsigned int argc, char *argv[],
35 void *driverarg, dns_db_t **dbp);
36
37/*%<
38 * Create a new database of type "rbt" (or "rbt64"). Called via
39 * dns_db_create(); see documentation for that function for more details.
40 *
41 * If argv[0] is set, it points to a valid memory context to be used for
42 * allocation of heap memory. Generally this is used for cache databases
43 * only.
44 *
45 * Requires:
46 *
47 * \li argc == 0 or argv[0] is a valid memory context.
48 */
49
50ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
51
52#endif /* DNS_RBTDB_H */
53
